chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerms L n (subAllTerms n ts m)) -> exists a : nat, In a (freeVarTerms L n ts) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m a))

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : Term L, P t. Definition
freeVarTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Terms L n -> list nat
subAllTerms : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation Terms := (fol.Terms L)
freeVarTerm : forall L : Language, fol.Term L -> list nat
freeVarSubAllTerm1 : forall (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm t m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarTerm L t) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
freeVarSubTerms4 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n ts)
freeVarSubTerms2 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
freeVarSubTerms1 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
freeVarSubTerms3 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerms L n ts)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
subTermsNil : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> substituteTerms L n ts v s = ts
subAllTerms_ext : forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllTerms n ts m1 = subAllTerms n ts m2
freeVarMap1 : forall (l : list nat) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In n l -> In v (freeVarMap l m)
subTermsTrans : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerms L n ts)) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s = substituteTerms L n ts v1 s
subTermsExch : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 s1
subTermsId : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat), substituteTerms L n ts v (fol.var L v) = ts
subSubTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 (substituteTerm L s1 v2 s2)
In_freeVarListFormulaE : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (F : fol.Formulas L), In v (freeVarListFormula L F) -> exists f : fol.Formula L, In v (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In f F
freeVarSubTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
subFormulaForall2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (fol.forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then fol.forallH L x f else fol.forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s))
subFormulaExist2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (existH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then existH L x f else existH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s))
freeVarSubTerm4 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L t)
freeVarSubTerm3 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerm L t)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Type), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> SProp), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
substituteTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Terms L n -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n
Tcons : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n)
freeVarSubTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L t) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
Terms_Term_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
Terms_Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
freeVarSubFormula2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s))
subAllTerm = fix subAllTerm (t : fol.Term L) : (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Term L := match t with | @fol.var _ x => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => m x | @fol.apply _ f ts => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => fol.apply L f (subAllTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts m) end with subAllTerms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) {struct ts} : (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return ((nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => fun _ : nat -> fol.Term L => Tnil L | @Tcons _ n' t ss => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => Tcons L n' (subAllTerm t m) (subAllTerms n' ss m) end for subAllTerm : fol.Term L ->...-> fol.Term L Arguments subAllTerm _ _%function_scope
freeVarSubFormula3 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarFormula L f)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
substituteFormulaForallNice : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}), (forall (b : fol.Formula L) (q : lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a)) (r : nat * fol.Term L), z1 b q r = z2 b q r) -> forall q : nat * fol.Term L, substituteFormulaForall L v a z1 q = substituteFormulaForall L v a z2 q
subTermFunction : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f))) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerm L (fol.apply L f ts) v s = fol.apply L f (substituteTerms L (arity L (inr f)) ts v s)
subFormulaRelation : forall (L : Language) (r : Relations L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (fol.atomic L r ts) v s = fol.atomic L r (substituteTerms L (arity L (inl r)) ts v s)
subFormulaNTE : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), (forall (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)) /\ (forall (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarFormula L f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s) (substituteFormula L f v1 s))) /\ (forall (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L...
freeVarSubFormula4 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L f)
Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> fol.Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : fol.Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n) Arguments fol.var _ _%nat_scope Arguments fol.Terms _ _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _ _%nat_scope
subAllFormula = fix subAllFormula (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) {struct f} : fol.Formula L := match f with | @fol.equal _ t s => fol.equal L (subAllTerm t m) (subAllTerm s m) | @fol.atomic _ r ts => fol.atomic L r (subAllTerms (arity L (inl r)) ts m) | @fol.impH _ f0 g => fol.impH L (subAllFormula f0 m) (subAllFormula g m) | @fol.notH _ f0 => fol.notH L (subAllFormula f0 m) | @fol.forallH _ n f0 => let nv := newVar (freeVarFormula L f0 ++ freeVarMap (freeVarFormula L (fol.forallH L n f0)) m) in fol.forallH L nv (subAllFormula f0 (fun v : nat => if Nat.eq_dec v n then fol.var L nv else m v)) end : fol.Formula L ->...-> fol.Formula L Arguments subAllFormula _ _%function_scope
Terms_Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Set) (P0 : nat -> Set), (nat -> P) -> (forall f0 : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0)) -> P0 (arity L (inr f0)) -> P) -> P0 0 -> (forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> P -> fol.Terms L n -> P0 n -> P0 (S n)) -> forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> P0 n

```coq
intros n ts m v H.
apply freeVarSubTerm4 in H as [Hnotin Hfreet].
apply freeVarSubTerms1 in Hnotin as Hfreevar.
apply freeVarSubTerms3 in Hfreet as [Hin | Hints].
- apply freeVarSubTerm2 in Hin as Hin'.
  exists a. auto.
- apply Hfreevar in Hin. contradiction.
Qed.```

original: intros n ts m v H. apply freeVarSubTerm4 in H as [Hnotin Hfreet]. apply freeVarSubTerms1 in Hnotin as Hfreevar. apply freeVarSubTerms3 in Hfreet as [Hin | Hints]. - apply freeVarSubTerm2 in Hin as Hin'. exists a. auto. - apply Hfreevar in Hin. contradiction.
